text:
A large statement, for instance creating a large stored procedure, can create a 
line that is too long for MSSQL server to handle.  Actually, it could be the 
JSQLConnect driver, but regardless, changing the truncation statement to use 
newline instead of a space fixes it, but this might cause problems for other 
databases.

Maybe a "preserveWhiteSpace" attribute would be helpful?
